com.tutego.jrtf

Class RtfPicture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tutego.jrtf.RtfPicture

  • public class RtfPicture
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an image which can be added to an RTF document.

    • Nested Class Summary
